creator: paul@swi.com
text:
The cvschangelog task doesn't seem to report changes for the current calendar 
day.

The problem lies in the fact that the exec'ed cvs command is in the form:
> cvs log "-d >=2002-11-7"
rather than:
> cvs log -d ">=2002-11-7"

The two commands return different results when changes have been made today!

I will be submitting a patch shortly.
Sounds like a duplicate of PR#13622
creator: bodewig@apache.org
bodewig@apache.org
text: *** Bug 13622 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
I've left the noise in, feel free to file an enhancement request for a quiet
attribute that adds -q.

Other than that, patch committed, thanks.
